# Issue Templates

This directory contains GitHub issue templates for the Asper Beauty Shop project.

## Available Templates

- **ğŸ› Bug Report** - Report bugs with built-in sub-tasks for resolution
- **âœ¨ Feature Request** - Suggest new features with implementation breakdown
- **ğŸ”§ Enhancement** - Propose improvements to existing functionality
- **ğŸ“Š Epic** - Track large features with multiple sub-issues and phases

## Quick Start

1. Go to [New Issue](../../issues/new/choose)
2. Select the appropriate template
3. Fill in the required fields
4. Use the sub-task checkboxes to break down work

## Documentation

For detailed guidance, see [Issue Template Guide](../ISSUE_TEMPLATE_GUIDE.md).
